2888.verse: And they do not come to you with an argument except that We bring you the truth and the best explanation.

2889.verse: The ones who are gathered on their faces to Hell - those are the worst in position and farthest astray in [their] way.

2890.verse: And We had certainly given Moses the Scripture and appointed with him his brother Aaron as an assistant.

2891.verse: And We said, "Go both of you to the people who have denied Our signs." Then We destroyed them with [complete] destruction.

2892.verse: And the people of Noah - when they denied the messengers, We drowned them, and We made them for mankind a sign. And We have prepared for the wrongdoers a painful punishment.

2893.verse: And [We destroyed] 'Aad and Thamud and the companions of the well and many generations between them.

2894.verse: And for each We presented examples [as warnings], and each We destroyed with [total] destruction.

2895.verse: And they have already come upon the town which was showered with a rain of evil. So have they not seen it? But they are not expecting resurrection.

2896.verse: And when they see you, [O Muhammad], they take you not except in ridicule, [saying], "Is this the one whom Allah has sent as a messenger?

2897.verse: He almost would have misled us from our gods had we not been steadfast in [worship of] them." But they are going to know, when they see the punishment, who is farthest astray in [his] way.

2898.verse: Have you seen the one who takes as his god his own desire? Then would you be responsible for him?
